sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card, Progress, Typography, Popover, Steps } from 'antd' import { CheckCircleOutlined, LikeOutlined, ExclamationCircleOutlined, SafetyOutlined, SendOutlined, AudioOutlined, CustomerServiceOutlined, SmileOutlined, InfoCircleOutlined, FileProtectOutlined, MessageOutlined, MailOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; const { Title, Paragraph } = Typography const { Step } = Steps; const JourneyProgress = () => { const content = ( <> ); const content_2 = ( <> ); return ( IVR Journey <Popover content={content} title="Progress" trigger="hover"> <span style={{ fontSize: '50%', cursor: 'pointer', marginLeft: '0.5%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> </Popover> } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> SMS Journey <Popover content={content} title="Progress" trigger="hover"> <span style={{ fontSize: '50%', cursor: 'pointer', marginLeft: '0.5%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> </Popover> } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> E-mail Journey <Popover content={content_2} title="Progress" trigger="hover"> <span style={{ fontSize: '50%', cursor: 'pointer', marginLeft: '0.5%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> </Popover> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> ) } export default JourneyProgress
